column1: De Bilt (Dutch pronunciation: [də ˈbɪlt] (listen)) is a municipality and a town in the Netherlands
column2: in the province of Utrecht. De Bilt had a population of 42
column3: 824 in 2019 and is the seat of the headquarters of the Royal Dutch Meteorological Institute

column1: It is the ancestral home and namesake for the prominent Vanderbilt family of the United States.
